Description: "NO BROKER FEE" Gorgeous 3 bedroom apartment located in the heart of South Boston, right near the beach! This modern apartment feature hardwood floor, oversized closets, black fixtures, gorgeous subway tile in the bathroom, natural light, open concept living space with kitchen, two light sconce in bathrooms, oversized sinks, warm lighting, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher! This building has laundry and parking depending on availability in a lot in the back of the building. Ideally located near the South Boston beaches (M Street, L Street, etc.), a park, Pleasure Island, tennis courts, and restaurants. There are several bus lines nearby including the 11, 10, 7, and 9 lines.
